remarks: One of the conditions showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r4" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlaxr4.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlaxr4.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlaxr4.3 $e |- A = B $.
qlaxr4i $p |- ( _|_ ` A ) = ( _|_ ` B ) $.
